item.title: Glory Box
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.md#ive-been-awake-too-long-vyl-wnanory|I’m so tired, of playing]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.md#ive-been-awake-too-long-vyl-wnanory|Playing with this bow and arrow]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.md#ive-been-awake-too-long-vyl-wnanory|Gonna give my heart away]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.md#ive-been-awake-too-long-vyl-wnanory|Leave it to the other girls to play]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/awake_too_long.

item.title: Numb
item.description: [[songs/a/architects/lost_forever_∕∕_lost_together/gravedigger.md#you-sold-us-all-down-the-river-vyl-wnanory|Unable, so lost]] [[songs/a/architects/lost_forever_∕∕_lost_together/gravedigger.md#you-sold-us-all-down-the-river-vyl-wnanory|I can’t find my way]] [[songs/a/architects/lost_forever_∕∕_lost_together/gravedigger.md#you-sold-us-all-down-the-river-vyl-wnanory|Been searching, but I have never seen]] [[songs/a/architects/lost_forever_∕∕_lost_together/gravedigger.md#you-sold-us-all-down-the-river-vyl-wnanory|A turning, a turning from deceit]] [[songs/c/curve/doppelgänger/lillies_dying.

item.title: Only You
item.description: [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.md#no-one-knows-what-its-like-vyl-wnanory|We suffer everyday, what is it for?]] [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.md#no-one-knows-what-its-like-vyl-wnanory|These crowns of illusion are fooling us all]] [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.md#no-one-knows-what-its-like-vyl-wnanory|And now I am weary, and I feel like I do]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/city_of_angels_hybrid_mix.

item.title: Roads
item.description: [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/light_up_the_night.md#my-dying-eyes–scream-with-pain-vyl-wnanory|Oh, can’t anybody see?]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/light_up_the_night.md#my-dying-eyes–scream-with-pain-vyl-wnanory|We’ve got a war to fight]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/light_up_the_night.md#my-dying-eyes–scream-with-pain-vyl-wnanory|Never found our way]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/light_up_the_night.md#my-dying-eyes–scream-with-pain-vyl-wnanory|Regardless of what they say]] [[songs/s/symphony_x/iconoclast/light_up_the_night.
